parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ProgramId
parameters.description: The IDs of the episode lists that you want to query. If you set this parameter, only the information about the specified episode lists is returned. If you do not set this parameter, the information about all episode lists that belong to the current account is returned.
